author: Miguel Barrera
title: WorldWide ADA/local fiat possible
description: Cardano should be worthy of baking the unbank but people in several countries of the world CAN'T use their own fiat to buy ADA yet

author: Travis
title: Crypto Blog & Cardano Podcast
description: Many people still don't understand blockchain and are afraid of it the big bad Cryptos. Cardano may as well be a type of cheese to them.

author: Inthedow3
title: A Cardano editorial news website
description: We need to have greater news coverage across the internet related to the ongoing problems that Cardano infrastructure is trying to solve

author: wang.jon.w
title: Cardano Hackathon
description: Exposing outside developers and innovators to Cardano through a hackathon would bring fresh insight to the current ecosystem.

author: rui cunha
title: Telecom infrastructure tokenization
description: Build a team to help the tokenization of a several open RAN municipal projects.

author: kessen
title: Adaption and integration of Cardano
description: Implementing Cardano in society requires also many non ICT technical aspects: legal, political, stakeholders postions, etc

author: Q U A S A R
title: Gauntlets of Catalyst Courts
description: Project Catalyst wants to attract the best/brightest outside entrepreneurs/firms and submit proposals in F5/F6.

author: Dave Crossland
title: Beautiful and clear results page(s)
description:
As a person new to catalyst, I want to know the results/status of previous Funds.
 
The F1 PDF was a good start, but is now out of date.

author: janekholsten
title: Cardano Vision Website Germany
description:
The germans are very sceptic on the entire cryptospace.
Many barely know that bitcoin exists and think it exists for criminal use only.

author: WADA(West Africa Decentralized Alliance)
title: West Africa Proposer Outreach
description: West African entrepreneurs are unaware of the Project Catalyst's funding campaigns and the community's encouragement of African proposals

author: jeffg
title: University/College Outreach
description: Solicit the youngest and brightest from around the globe to contribute to the network. Raising awareness with student organizations.

author: cole.vt
title: Sustainable ADA
description: Sustainable ADA will expand outreach and education for explaining use cases/examples of how Cardano can help create a sustainable world.

author: liamcardano
title: Proposer to Producer Demo
description: The step-by-step process of proposing a project, getting it funded and applying it in the real world is not clear and accessible.

author: Ryan Morrison
title: Free Online Course about Catalyst
description: People outside of the Cardano community don't know/understand what Catalyst is and how they can apply to get their project funded.

author: seyeoyeniyi
title: A platform for ordering drugs onlin
description: Problem of need for delivering drugs to doorstep of patients especially in light of physical restrictions due to Corona Virus

author: Smithn54
title: Viral Media Campaign
description: Building a brand reaching 1 billion people will require bold strategy and precise execution when Bitcoin is so far ahead in mindshare

author: Rfranks08
title: Idea to Team Connection Support
description: Some folks with good ideas and business acumen cant code; some folks who can code don't have the business acumen
